repo.Name: CC-Web-Mrg
repo.Description: The Asterisk is an open source telephony switching and private branch exchange service for Linux. This Repo is a web UI for Asterisk. You can edit some conf file, change the state of machine, nd get state of Asterisk. If you're interested, please check the readme for more detail.
